titleStmt.title: A letter from an officer in His Majesties army, to a gentleman in Glocester-shire upon occasion of certain quære's [sic] scattered about that countrey.
titleStmt.author: Heylyn, Peter, 1600-1662.

notesStmt.note: The queries concern the continuing of Parliament, the King's protection of delinquents, and the Papists.
Attributed to Peter Heylyn. Cf. BLC.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
